00054 #ifndef INDRI_QUERYEXPANDER_HPP
00055 #define INDRI_QUERYEXPANDER_HPP
00056 
00057 #include <string>
00058 #include <vector>
00059 #include <map>
00060 
00061 #include "indri/QueryEnvironment.hpp"
00062 #include "indri/Parameters.hpp"
00063 
00064 struct QueryExpanderSort {
00065 public:
00066   bool operator() ( const std::pair<std::string, double>& one, const std::pair<std::string, double>& two ) const {
00067     return one.second > two.second;
00068   }
00069 };
00070 
00071 class QueryExpander {
00072 private:
00073   std::map<std::string, UINT64> _cf_cache;
00074   
00075 protected:
00076   QueryEnvironment * _env;
00077   Parameters _param;
00078 
00079   std::vector<DocumentVector*> getDocumentVectors( std::vector<ScoredExtentResult>& results, int rmDocs );
00080   std::vector<std::string> * getVocabulary( std::vector<ScoredExtentResult>& results, int rmDocs );
00081   std::vector<std::string> * getVocabulary( std::vector<DocumentVector*>& docVectors );
00082   std::string buildQuery( const std::string& originalQuery, double originalWeight,
00083                           const std::vector< std::pair<std::string, double> >& expansionTerms,
00084                           int termCount );
00085   UINT64 getCF( const std::string& term );
00086   
00087 public:
00088   QueryExpander( QueryEnvironment * env , Parameters& param );
00089   virtual ~QueryExpander() {};
00090 
00091   // runs original query, expands query based on results ( via expand( .. ) ), then runs expanded query
00092   std::vector<ScoredExtentResult> runExpandedQuery( std::string originalQuery , int resultsRequested , bool verbose = false );
00093   
00094   // creates expanded query from an original query and a ranked list of documents
00095   virtual std::string expand( std::string originalQuery , std::vector<ScoredExtentResult>& results ) = 0;
00096 };
00097 
00098 #endif
